patterns: How can I book an Uber ride?
responses: You can book an Uber ride through the Uber app on your mobile device. I can guide you through the process if you'd like.

patterns: Tell me about the Uber ride estimate
responses: You can check the Uber ride estimate in the app before confirming your booking. Please provide your pickup and drop-off locations for a more accurate estimate.
